name: Dormant World
description: A retro NES/Famicom-inspired platformer, Dormant World leaves the fate of the world in the player's hands. Can you single-handedly defeat the gods of sleep and save the world from endless slumber?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Later Processor: An Okay Processor Graphics: An Okay Graphics Card Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any Sound Card Additional Notes: Should work on older machines too. If in doubt, try the demo version!
